top_questions.text: Differentiate between computerized and non-computerized databases.

What is AI? Enlist two application areas of AI. f) What is hardware security? Enlist any two measures to protect it. g) What is field property in MS-Access? Enlist any four of them. h) What is Indexing? Why form and report are used in MS-Access? i) What is Query? Write the types of Action Query.
What is a firewall? Enlist the types of firewall.
Write any two keywords used in C-programming.
The device that is used to connect two networks with different communication protocols.
